title: And the Pool Party Pentathlon winners are...

replies.body: Umm riot, it's not summer here in OCE :/
exactly it is winter.....now i want summer holidays to arrive.
It is now
Pool Party Taliyah?
pool party urgot
give him a thin bikini and covered in lotion
Pool Party Yorick with his little bucket and spade. {{champion:83}}
i need me some of that
don't forget the glistening skin and flowing hair {{champion:6}}
^ and Pool party Aurelion Sol.
Make sure there's also Pool Party Ahri with a beach ball :D {{champion:103}} {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
Yeah it would be like she's playing volley ball or blitz ball
or Orianna
for god sake it's frigging cold right now
Britain is a lot like an Australian winter. Except Britain doesn't have a new Prime Minister every 18 months.
wow. someone knows Australia exists. {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}
wait, this is the oceania server... {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
_************{{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}} ************_
arcade lux{{champion:99}} ...but these are pool party skins soooo...{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
pool party lux? is she in the background of miss fortune's pool party skin? {{champion:99}}
she is in Leona's
When will the skins be available in Hextech Boxes?
pool party Kha'zix
i wanna see a pool party zed it would be epic to see him shirtless and he could wear a cap and sunglasses and a scuba mask for the hidden face
he'd have 10 abs instead of 6 {{champion:238}}
Wait, why is Leona in the *swoons* line. Is there something canon that Riot knows and we don't?
riot knows all {{champion:89}} + {{champion:21}}
Still no Rengar skin...
rengar feels rejected... they should make an event about that. oh, wait, he's rejected. {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Shirtless Taric....mmmmmmmm....yum
Lol ikr
that shiny, glistening feel. i just want to rub him {{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}
yeah but what about pool party Jinx {{champion:222}}
riot wouldnt have much to work w/
savage
riot hardly ever has much to work w/ {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
So is URF mode permanent or is this still vanilla league of legends?{{champion:120}}
Is that pool party Braum in the background of Pool party Taric?
pool party JANNAAA{{champion:40}} {{champion:40}} {{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}
